description: {"blocks":[{"key":"atk9o","text":"This method was developed at the FDA’s Center for Food Safety and Applied Nutrition for GenomeTrakr’s pandemic response project, monitoring SARS-CoV-2 variants in wastewater​​. Protocols developed for this project cover wastewater collection, concentration, RNA extraction, RT-qPCR detection, library prep, genome sequencing, quality control checks, and data submission to NCBI. This method describes the rapid concentration of intact viruses from wastewater using a combination of PEG precipitation and ultracentrifugation. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"6r7m6","text":"EQUIPMENT AND SUPPLIES:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":23}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3nkhv","text":"1. Biological Safety Cabinet (BSC Type A2 or higher air exchange rate)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2i73d","text":"2. Nalgene PPCO 1L centrifuge bottles (Fisher Scientific, 05-562-25, or equivalent)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6nis4","text":"3. Adjustable Calibrated Micropipettor (1000 μl) ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4clq0","text":"4. Hype-Wipe Disinfecting Towelettes (Fisher Scientific 14-412-56 or equivalent) ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"59fuj","text":"5. DNase/RNase-free microcentrifuge tubes 2.0 mL, non-stick, low retention, siliconized (Life Technologies AM12475)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fgjvp","text":"6. Filter barrier aerosol resistant micropipettor tips DNase/RNase free (0.2 – 1000 μl)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"drihs","text":"7. Centrifuge capable of speeds of  ≥12,000 x g (e.g., ThermoFisher RC6), and with rotors capable of holding 50ml conical tubes (ThermoFisher Scientific, 36-101-0816, or equivalent)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9lapf","text":"8. 50ml conical tubes (Fisher Scientific, 14-959-49A).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"52c1g","text":"9. 100mL disposable graduated pipettes (Fisher Scientific, 03-395-177, or equivalent)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"sbtp","text":"10. 50ml disposable graduated pipettes (Fisher Scientific, 13-678-11F, or equivalent)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"akkn3","text":"11. FY14 50 carbon fiber rotor (ThermoFisher Scientific, 46922, or equivalent)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7mjof","text":"12. Ultracentrifuge capable of speeds of ≥170,000 x g (e.g., Sorvall WX90) and with rotors capable of holding 70ml ultracentrifuge tubes (ThermoFisher Scientific, 75000100, or equivalent)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"aeocm","text":"13. Refrigerated incubator shaker (Eppendorf New Brunswick™ I24R shaker M1344-0014 or equivalent)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"75ieb","text":"14.
